column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Which of your competitors do you expect to pose the biggest challenge to your candidacy ? Why ?
#Text=What makes you the most desirable of all candidates running in the riding ?
#Text=The older parties are a challenge because people tend to vote along party lines and that is hard to change .

#Text=However , I believe people , young and old , are realizing the importance of a healthy environment , as I have done , and are starting to realize that the Green Party is a viable alternative to those parties that have failed to lead on this issue .
#Text=I am an open and friendly person and will be approachable to my constituents .
#Text=My willingness to communicate is the key strength I bring to the table .
#Text=What do you feel are the three most important issues to voters in your riding ?
#Text=Are these the same top three issues that are most important to you ?
#Text=What would you do to address these issues ?
#Text=The top three issues for voters in Willowdale are Environment , Health Care and Schools .
#Text=My priorities are similar , except I would add Proportional Representation .
#Text=This election , we have a once in a lifetime opportunity to change the electoral system and make sure that every vote counts .
#Text=The Green Party has a comprehensive platform for addressing Environment , Health Care and Schools , based on sensible and affordable choices .
#Text=We would shift taxes from income or payroll to waste and pollution .
#Text=This will promote good policy without costing more .
#Text=Cleaner air and water will mean lower health costs .
#Text=Last year 88,000 people went to Emergency Rooms because of air pollution-caused difficulties .
#Text=We also need to focus on preventive medicine and encourage our Health Care system to use alternative medicine , where appropriate , to keep us healthy .
#Text=We should be encouraging children and adults to eat right and be active by providing nutrition education and counselling and exercise programs .
#Text=What should be the first order of business in the 39th Legislative Assembly ?

#Text=The Green Party would implement its economic plan of shifting taxes to shift behaviours and to upload services to the province that has been downloaded by previous governments , so we can start building stronger more sustainable cities in our province .
#Text=Are the property taxes in your riding at a fair level for the amount of services received in the municipality ?
#Text=At the centre of the Green Party ’s platform is a new way of thinking about taxes – where we shift from taxing what you earn to what you burn .

#Text=With regards to property taxes , this would mean replacing the existing system with a " location value tax " based only on land and not building values , to encourage denser growth in urban areas .

column1: #Text=How can the province lead the way in stimulating job creation ?
